remarks: Morphisms between two initial objects are inverses.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Apr-2020.)
statement:
initoeu1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
initoeu1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( InitO ` C ) ) $.
initoeu1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( InitO ` C ) ) $.
2initoinv $p |- ( ( ph /\ G e. ( B ( Hom ` C ) A ) /\ F e. ( A ( Hom ` C ) B ) ) -> F ( A ( Inv ` C ) B ) G ) $.
